title: Stack Implementation
statement:
# Stack Operations

Simulate stack operations and output the final state.

## Problem Description

Perform a sequence of stack operations:
- PUSH X: Push integer X onto the stack
- POP: Remove top element
- TOP: Print the top element (or EMPTY if stack is empty)

Print the result of each TOP operation.

## Input Format

First line: integer N (number of operations)
Next N lines: operations

## Output Format

Output of each TOP operation, one per line.

## Constraints

- 1 ≤ N ≤ 1000
